Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District Prop. No. 1 -- 20.18 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Renewal - Salaries)
Race.FullText: Shall Parishwide School District of Caddo Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a special tax of a twenty and eighteen hundredths (20.18) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $34,314,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of paying salaries and benefits for teachers and other personnel employed by the Caddo Parish School Board?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District Prop. No. 2 -- 5.15 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Millage Renewal - School Improvements)
Race.FullText: Shall Parishwide School District of Caddo Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a special tax of five and fifteen hundredths (5.15) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $8,757,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of paying the costs of renovation, repair and improvement of existing public school buildings and facilities in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District Prop. No. 3 -- 1.25 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District Propositions
Proposition No. 3 
(Millage Renewal - Technology)
Race.FullText: Shall Parishwide School District of Caddo Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a special tax of one and twenty-five hundredths (1.25) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $2,125,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of paying the costs of constructing, acquiring, renovating, improving, maintaining and/or operating computers, software and peripheral equipment, facilities and technological programs at public schools in Caddo Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire District Number Four -- $150 Service Charge - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire District Number Four Proposition
(Service Charge Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Caddo Parish Fire District Number Four, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy and collect a service charge not to exceed One Hundred Fifty Dollars ($150) per year on each residential dwelling, and commercial structure subject to taxation in the District pursuant to LA R.S. 40:1502.15 (an estimated $543,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purposes of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment, emergency medical and rescue equipment, in and for the District, including paying the cost of fire hydrant rentals for fire protection purposes and salaries of firemen, and shall be framed so as to cover and shall be used for the costs either incurred or for contracting of any or all fire protection, emergency medical transportation, and all emergency services incidental thereto?
